discover_responses:
I'm here to help you find and organise the games that you are looking for. You can ask me to:
         - Search for games by name
         - Add games to your collection
         - Remove games from your collection
         - Display your game collection
         And other more...

For more details, please type:
         "What can you do?"

You can also ask me to:
         - Keep track of your name
         - Enjoy some friendly small talk
         - Challenge me with fun trivia questions

         Just ask away!

Thank you for asking! You can say:
         - "I am looking for a game" or "I am looking for [game name]" to search for games
         - "Add [game name] to my collection" to add a game to your collection
         - "Remove [game name] from my collection" to remove a game from your collection
         - "Show my collection" to display your game collection

You can also ask me to:
         - Keep track of your name (e.g., "What is my name?", "My name is [your name]")
         - Enjoy some friendly small talk (e.g., "How are you?")
         - Challenge me with fun trivia questions (e.g., "What are stocks and bonds?")

         Just ask away!
If you need more help, you can ask "What can you do?"
